medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute pain and swelling in the left ankle and knee.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed over the preceding 24 hours, with a 14-year history of flitting arthritis. Episodes had recurred at progressively shorter intervals, now occurring monthly and lasting approximately 10 days each time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of flitting arthritis, managed with rest, paracetamol, and diclofenac for mechanical back pain.
medical_history.social_history: Non-smoker; consumes 4 units of alcohol weekly.
